data.message: This is so sick and twisted! Gee, good thing u dont wanna make ppl put u up so high that you dont even seem real, or alive lol. Last night, truthfully i hit my knee and today i grabbed my chest...i know pain that few have ever touched. . thought i knew it all until recently.. Then suddenly something will come and touch our worlds and everything is different and changed. Good and bad... Well, bo matter how u feel about me, i am just so glad ur alive... And i know your name.
